title: Adam I. Lapidus
text: Adam I. Lapidus (born 1963) is an American television writer, whose credits include "<a href="Phil%20of%20the%20Future">Phil of the Future</a>", "<a href="Full%20House">Full House</a>", "<a href="Smart%20Guy">Smart Guy</a>", "<a href="Jessie%20%282011%20TV%20series%29">Jessie</a>", "<a href="Bunk%27d">Bunk'd</a>", "<a href="The%20Suite%20Life%20of%20Zack%20%26amp%3B%20Cody">The Suite Life of Zack & Cody</a>", "<a href="The%20Suite%20Life%20on%20Deck">The Suite Life on Deck</a>" and the season four "<a href="The%20Simpsons">Simpsons</a>" episode, "<a href="The%20Front%20%28The%20Simpsons%29">The Front</a>". On the audio commentary he commented that he uses the "I." when using his full name because he was trying to imitate <a href="James%20L.%20Brooks">James L. Brooks</a>, another Simpsons writer whom Lapidus admired.
